statements: SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, from_wallet_address FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT to_wallet_address, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT from_wallet_address FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, from_wallet_address, to_wallet_address, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE block_number = 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE from_wallet_address = '0x123abc' ORDER BY block_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE to_wallet_address LIKE '0x%' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT block_number FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata;
SELECT metadata_id, transaction_id, metadata FROM transaction_metadata;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '%fraud%' OR receiver_address LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT st.transaction_id, tm.metadata FROM suspicious_transactions st JOIN transaction_metadata tm ON st.transaction_id = tm.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '0x%' AND receiver_address LIKE '1x%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE sender_address = '123abc' AND receiver_address = '456def';
SELECT * FROM flagged_addresses WHERE flagged_reason = 'high_risk' ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.sender_address, l.log_message FROM suspicious_transactions t INNER JOIN transaction_logs l ON t.transaction_id = l.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash FROM blocks ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT address, is_suspicious FROM addresses WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.sender_address, b.block_id, b.block_hash FROM transactions t JOIN transactions_metadata tm ON t.transaction_id = tm.transaction_id JOIN blocks b ON b.block_id = tm.block_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, b.block_hash, a.address, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN blocks b ON t.transaction_id = b.block_id JOIN addresses a ON t.transaction_id = a.address_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, b.timestamp AS block_timestamp, a.is_suspicious FROM transactions_metadata tm JOIN transactions t ON tm.transaction_id = t.transaction_id JOIN blocks b ON tm.block_id = b.block_id JOIN addresses a ON tm.address_id = a.address_id;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_accounts;
SELECT account_address, account_type FROM suspicious_accounts WHERE suspicious_level > 5;
SELECT account_id, account_type, suspicious_level FROM suspicious_accounts ORDER BY suspicious_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount, transaction_description FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_accounts WHERE suspicious_level > 5 ORDER BY account_id DESC
SELECT account_address, account_type FROM suspicious_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Fraudulent' ORDER BY account_id ASC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_description FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blockchain WHERE block_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY block_id ASC
SELECT transaction_id, suspect_reason, suspect_score FROM suspect_transactions WHERE suspect_score < 50 ORDER BY transaction_id
